channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17529] Bucket Map Join : Sets incorrect edge type causing execution failure
item.description: If while traversing the tree to generate tasks, a bucket mapjoin may set its edge as CUSTOM_SIMPLE_EDGE against CUSTOM_EDGE if the bigtable is already not traversed causing Tez to assert and fail the vertex.
item.summary: Bucket Map Join : Sets incorrect edge type causing execution failure

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
jdere hagleitn gopalv Can you please review?

Fixed the issue and updated the tests to actually test bucket mapjoin.
Uploaded wrong patch
Somehow last patch did not trigger a test run. Reuploading the patch again.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12887141/HIVE-17529.1.patch
